name: KCNeumorphicKit
summary: KCNeumorphicKit is a library to develop Neumorphic UI for iOS applications using Swift.
description: NeuKit is a library built using cocoa pods to develop Neumorphic UI for iOS application using Swift programming language. Today, the world is moving more and more towards usage of mobile applications. Also, within the last decade, massive amount of applications has been developed for users to solve real life problems with user friendly UI. In the new era, UI developed using neumorphic design will overcome the traditional plain UI and this library will help developers to develop highly attractive UI for their applications.
